translations: n.独立战争时立即应召的民兵；民兵

phrs.translation: 明德美, 民兵, 后备民兵, 美国明德美
民兵3型, 洲际弹道导弹, 民兵III
系统备份工具, 系统备份压缩备份软件
先进义勇兵飞弹计算机, 先进义勇兵飞弹电脑

sentences.sentence: I asked a lot of questions during the initial meetings with Minuteman.
sentences.translation: 在与Minuteman初次会面期间我问了很多问题。

sentences.sentence: Minuteman offers a low cost of ownership and a high quality commitment to dealers and customers.
sentences.translation: 明德美提供了一个低拥有成本和高品质的承诺，给经销商和顾客。

sentences.sentence: Minuteman Press enabled me to leave behind unpredictable schedules so that I could have more time with my wife and three children.
sentences.translation: Minuteman Press激发我离开原来不稳定的时间表，以至于我能够有更多的时间陪伴我的妻子和三个孩子。
